presentationTable.name: Project Costs in Document Currency
presentationTable.description: Project Costs derived from Cost Distribution Lines

presentationColumns.name: Raw Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Actual Raw Cost incurred
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Raw Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Burden Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Actual Burden Cost calculated as difference between Burdened Cost and Raw Cost
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Burden Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Burdened Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Actual Burdened Cost incurred
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Burdened Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Billable Raw Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Actual Raw Cost from Cost distribution lines flagged as billable
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Billable Raw Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Billable Burden Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Billable Burden Cost calculated as difference between Billable cost and Billable Raw Cost
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Billable Burden Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Billable Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Actual Burdened Cost from Cost distribution lines flagged as billable
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Billable Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Non-Billable Raw Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Actual Raw Cost from Cost distribution lines flagged as not billable
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Non-Billable Raw Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Non-Billable Burden Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Non-Billable Burden Cost calculated as difference between Non-Billable cost and Non-Billable Raw Cost
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Non-Billable Burden Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Non-Billable Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Actual Burdened Cost from Cost distribution lines flagged as not billable
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Non-Billable Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Capitalizable Raw Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Actual Raw cost from Cost distribution lines flagged as Capitalizable for Capitalizable projects
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Capitalizable Raw Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Capitalizable Burden Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Capitalizable Burden Cost calculated as difference between Capitalizable Cost and Capitalizable Raw Cost
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Capitalizable Burden Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Capitalizable Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Raw cost or Burdened Cost from Cost distribution lines flagged as Capitalizable based on whether Raw or Burdened cost is Capitalizable for the project type
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Capitalizable Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Non-Capitalizable Raw Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the actual raw cost from cost distribution lines flagged as not Capitalizable for Capitalizable projects
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Non-Capitalizable Raw Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Non-Capitalizable Burden Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Non-Capitalizable Burden Cost calculated as difference between Non-Capitalizable Cost and Non-Capitalizable Raw Cost
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Non-Capitalizable Burden Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Non-Capitalizable Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the actual burdened cost from cost distribution lines flagged as not Capitalizable for Capitalizable projects
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Non-Capitalizable Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Billable and Capitalizable Raw Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the actual raw cost from cost distribution lines flagged as both Billable and Capitalizable
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Billable and Capitalizable Raw Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Billable and Capitalizable Burden Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Billable and Capitalizable Burden Cost calculated as difference between Billable and Capitalizable Burdened Cost and Raw Cost
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Billable and Capitalizable Burden Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Billable and Capitalizable Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Raw cost or Burdened Cost from Cost distribution lines flagged as Capitalizable and Billable based on whether Raw or Burdened cost is Capitalizable for the project type
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Billable and Capitalizable Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Labor Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Labor Cost calculated as Burdened Cost that is associated with Resource Class 'PEOPLE'
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Labor Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Equipment Cost
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Equipment  Cost calculated as Burdened Cost that is associated with Resource Class 'EQUIPMENT'
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Equipment Cost in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Transfer Price Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the amount charged by Provider Organization to the Receiver Organization including Transfer Price Markup
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Transfer Price in Document Currency
